name: Wizard Rush (dreggoon)
description:
This is the first game I made for a school group project with two of my friends. It's very simple but silly.

[Wizard Rush] by Chris, Michael, and Eric

 =Controls=

Movement: "W", "A", "S", "D" keys 

Aim: Mouse movement

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

=Instructions= 

The player transforms into the Wizard by touching the magic wand 

The player enters the portal to enter the next zone. 

The player fights off 7 waves of enemies. 

If the player loses all hearts, the player loses the game. 

If the player completes all of the waves, the player wins the game. 

Chris - Programmer, Sprite Maker, Game Designer 

Eric - Sprite Designer, Assistant Programmer, Game Designer

Michael - Background Designer, Sound Designer/Collector, Game Designer

All sprites and images used in the Wizard Rush were created by us.
